channel.title: Help on making it so when you attack a player, and he runs a bit you follow
channel.description: need Help on making it so when you attack a player, and he runs a bit you follow them and keep attacking them. Is this even possible?

@parkview wrote:

Well, ok thx for the help

item.title: Help on making it so when you attack a player, and he runs a bit you follow
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

You need to program following. I already have, and then add to where you attack to start following the other player. However this allows them to walk through anything to get to the person they are following. You need to know how walking works and some actual Java to make following work.

Read full topic
